Text.Page:
I heard the Tenebrara attacked the supply carriage.

That's terrible, but it seems out of the blue. I can't think what we might have done recently to anger them.

In any case, we still need those supplies. I'll need you to find them and get them back to us.

Oh, good! We'll get to handing these out as needed immediately.

You've helped a lot here, . Thank you.
Did you get lost? You're going to Outlaws' Nest.
